law.catch_line: Administrative regulations to effectuate authority granted in KRS 315.500(1).
law.text: The Kentucky Board of Pharmacy may promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A to allow pharmacists to effectuate the authority granted in KRS 315.500(1).
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2010.
